question: Given that p→q is an implication statement, in which case is it false?
choices: When p is true and q is true
When p is true and q is false
When p is false and q is true
When p is false and q is false
answer: When p is true and q is false

question: If all dogs bark and Fido is a dog, then which statement must be true?
